attributes.action: ban workers from going on strike and replace this with a function of the industrial tribunal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are perfectly good legal recourse for industrial disputes through the Industrial Tribunal. This needs to be extended so that people can take more action in front of a well informed panel to resolve disputes instead of inconveniencing everyone else. Such tribunals will make better judgments about what is appropriate that any union ever could
